__e: I don't know how you're doing what it is you're doing, but I know a coward when I see one.
I think, but none of this shit really looks familiar, does it?
I know a liar when I see one because I'm a liar.
I truly loved him once, but since things got so bad, I don't know him anymore.
And the pictures and videos do not recognize anyone.
I've no idea what's going on. It's like I don't know you anymore.
I reckon that I owe you that much after what happened.
But I recognize that my issues with Bobbi have nothing to do with her.
I am a man of the world. But at that moment, I must confess that I was stunned speechless.
But I know people who aren't.
I don't recognise the voice. Somebody who knows ME, obviously.
I mean, I can't imagine he would, but... but I don't even know who he is anymore.
I always saw you as something more. And now... I don't even recognize you.
I don't know who you are anymore.
I know a man's body when I see one.
Look, I do not know whether to tell you this, but you know that every time I come into the room, I feel your scent.
I recognize the name. The face does nothing for me.
